dataList.dlg:
- Shall we join them down there and help, Lady Dulcinea?
- No, I won't suffer the indignity of letting them strike me with those bats.
- Ooh... truly, a stance most sensible.

- ... Tad peculiar to have a Bloodfiend-hunting attraction here.
- It is but a show of Father's mercy and capacity for tolerance.
- Shall we change its name to 'Father's Merciful Demonstration of His Capacity for Tolerance'?
- ... How fatuous.

- Well, well! The timer's still tickin'! Don't tell me you guys are tuckered out already!
- If you are mentally fatigued, do not hesitate to pay me a visit.

- Look at them, swaying from side to side so ungracefully.
- I suppose that could be another way of enjoying this—
- Don't make excuses for them. I fail to see how any of this could be even remotely entertaining.

- FEVER TIME! Smack those unconscious Bloodfiends there to earn EXTRA points!
- O Barber... such flippant bending of the of rules cannot be healthy for the longevity of the game.
- It's more fun this way, don'tcha worry about it!

- Oh no! Your friend's at risk, over there!
- A Fixer worth their name doth not so lightly abandon their compatriot. Father has taught us that lesson many, many times.

- Hey, you there! Get off the stage if you're dead!
- If you are wounded, please visit the infirmary or pick up a hemobar.
- Right, then! Next wave of Bloodfiends, enter from stage left!

- ... A guest has taken a fall. Please transport them to the infirmary.
- Oh come on... Boys, girls! I told you to go easy on them!

- Well. That's game over, then.
- My, Lady Dulcinea! Children are listening! You can't just say that, your grace!

- Isn't my Parade much more preferable to this physically taxing attraction?
- I noticed that humans and Bloodfiends both enjoy frolicking and moving their bodies.

- Tick-tock! Time's running out, everyone! Let's keep pushing!
- Yet I must advise you not to hasten too much.

- Bloodfiends are preparing to launch a terrifying assault.
- Oh no! Who but our dearest guests to prevent this big, scary attack?

- ... Isn't that question a bit too difficult?
- Father raised the difficulty of the questions to make this attraction more enjoyable for adults as well.
- Haaah...

- I see that you have attained an understanding.
- Perfect! Bloodfiends with hats are weak to foam swords!

- Oh my! That swing completely whiffed!
- Why not try a different weapon that may fit the occasion better? By the entrance.

- Huh? Is that a water bottle?
- H-hey, k-kiddo! Water bottles aren't allowed inside our rides— WAHHHH!!!

- It is time to ward away the encroaching Bloodfiends with garlic.
- Ridiculous. Are any of us actually afraid of garlic?

- Ah... they must've enjoyed the hemobars. They play the role of angry Bloodfiends well.
- They're actually angry.
- Hm? Is that so...?
- Well, hemobars are disgusting.
- By the— did you see that? I-I think they doused themselves with water! ... Where'd everyone go? L-Lady Dulcinea, don't leave meee!!!

- Ta-da! Here's a surprise gift for all of you!
- Aha... an outfit of your own design.
- Wear my fashionista outfits to the rides and attractions!

- Ah, a terrible ordeal shall visit our dear guests soon.
- Hey, Priest... this isn't an 'ordeal'. It's penalty time! Avoid the squirt guns to the best of your abilities, or get hit by falling balls from the ceiling!

- Bonus points for hitting the sticker on the arm.
- Please, I ask you to remember to pick up your special reward by the exit.

- The special reward is... a free entry to Haunted: Bloody Mary.
- Now you can enjoy the spoooooky Haunted: Bloody Mary without having to pay with a blood pack! Please enjoy your time there!

- Feel free to go take a rest if you're feeling tired.
- Please ask one of the kind Bloodfiends for a way out~

- Leave through the back left! And return through the back left!
- T-that's the narration for the entrance. From here, it's "leave through the front right"...

- T-that may have been too forcefu—
- What a swing! Can ya hear your stress and tension flying away?!

- Lady Dulcinea, do you suppose that Bloodfiend who had to go to the infirmary earlier is doing okay?
- Got a little bruise, but he's okay. ... Is that a metal bat?
- ... Of course not, m'lady! It's a foam bat!

- What a performance! Psst, Priest. How come they're all going down in like two hits?
- Another dashing Fixer! ... I think there might've been an accident on stage.
- ... If they're going to fall so unceremoniously, they should go take a nap instead.

- I know the kiddos have been waiting for this moment~!
- ... "Today, I'm This Area's Fixer" time.
- The attraction is about to begin. Please enter in an orderly fashion.
